description:
File injection is broken for rebuilds.

I'm seeing the following nova-agent.log messages when trying to inject files (personalities) via the OSAPI v1.1:

2011-10-25 15:56:11,116 [INFO] Received command 'injectfile' with argument: 'cGF0aCxjb250ZW50cw=='
2011-10-25 15:56:11,116 [ERROR] Exception while trying to process command 'injectfile'
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "jsonparser.py", line 93, in parse_request
  File "__init__.py", line 99, in run_command
  File "file_inject.py", line 46, in injectfile_cmd
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/os.py", line 157, in makedirs
    mkdir(name, mode)
title: file injection fails when performing a rebuild

comments.content:
File injection is broken for rebuilds.

I'm seeing the following nova-agent.log messages when trying to inject files (personalities) via the OSAPI v1.1:

2011-10-25 15:56:11,116 [INFO] Received command 'injectfile' with argument: 'cGF0aCxjb250ZW50cw=='
2011-10-25 15:56:11,116 [ERROR] Exception while trying to process command 'injectfile'
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "jsonparser.py", line 93, in parse_request
  File "__init__.py", line 99, in run_command
  File "file_inject.py", line 46, in injectfile_cmd
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/os.py", line 157, in makedirs

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dan-prince

comments.content:
Hello Dan, or anyone else affected,

Accepted nova into oneiric-proposed, the package will build now and be available in a few hours. Please test and give feedback here. See https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/EnableProposed for documentation how to enable and use -proposed. Thank you in advance!
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~pitti
